name: Talia's Jigsaw Adventure
description:
Freeplay Mode:

Plenty of Free jigsaw puzzle images and Pay What You Want to get additional ones. Create your own challenge with your preferred cut type, number of pieces and with or without piece rotation enabled.

Journey Mode:

Guide Talia and her friend Oti in an awesome adventure to recover the stolen peach flowers smell from BaDream. Over 140 increasingly difficult custom jigsaw puzzles with beautifully drawn HD quality art depicting fun and cute cartoon animals, colorful birds, impressive fish, great dinosaurs, wild horses, impressive landscapes, amazing surreal fantasy places and castles as well as the more challenging abstract images. The game features power-ups, secret levels as well as funny and educational dialogues. Every solved jigsaw puzzle is a step forward in completing your big fun adventure.

Talia Jigsaw Adventure is a great collection of jigsaw puzzle games for children, boys and girls alike but can be fun as well as challenging for players of all ages.
